issue.title: [Rust] Support DictionaryArray in CSV and JSON formatters
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12493](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12493). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently the CSV and JSON formatters do not support JSON and CSV arrays
